highlight1: High integration, system optimized by AI-EMS.
highlight2: Weak grid infrastructure boost for HP charge.
highlight3: Compact design, all storage units and power units within single housing.
highlight5: Suitable for urban applications, especially for space-limiting, light usage demanding cases, e.g., 2 charging ports in central business district.
highlight6: Apparant coloring open for customization, open protocol for LED screen display.
